content.prompt:
The writer wants to reduce ambiguity in sentence 13 (reproduced below) by changing the placement of the underlined text, adjusting the punctuation and capitalization as needed.

Some familiar kindergarten activities are still present, but, notably, there is no focus on learning letters or numbers, such as singing songs and making crafts.

Which of the following is the most logical placement for the underlined text?

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
